talents.option1: +400 AoE Dragon Tail During Elder Dragon Form
+75% Breathe Fire Damage/Cast Range in Dragon Form

abilities.desc: Unleashes a breath of fire in front of Dragon Knight that burns enemies and reduces the damage their attacks deal.
abilities.name: Breathe Fire

abilities.desc: Dragon Knight smites an enemy unit in melee range with his shield, stunning it while dealing minor damage.  When in Elder Dragon Form, the cast range increases to 400.
abilities.name: Dragon Tail

abilities.desc: The life blood of the Dragon improves health regeneration and strengthens armor.
abilities.name: Dragon Blood

abilities.desc: Ignites an area, dealing damage over time that lingers on enemies in it. Has reduced cast range when melee.
abilities.name: Fireball

abilities.desc: Dragon Knight takes the form of one of three powerful elder dragons, increasing his speed, and Dragon Tail\'s range, while granting him new powers.LEVEL 1 Green Dragon - Corrosive Breath: attacks deal [20, 20, 20, 30] poison damage per second for [5.0, 5.0, 5.0] seconds. Works on structures.LEVEL 2 Red Dragon - Splash Attack: attacks damage all enemy units in a 350 radius for [75, 75, 75, 100]% damage, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.LEVEL 3 Blue Dragon - Frost Breath: slows movement speed by [-40, -40, -40, -60]% and attack speed by [-40, -40, -40, -60] of enemy units in Splash Attack range for [3.0, 3.0, 3.0] seconds, with Corrosive Breath added to the targets.
abilities.name: Elder Dragon Form
abilities.notes: Cooldowns of items that are different for ranged and melee units will be based on which form Dragon Knight was in when the item was used.
